website_summaries.verdict: Formula focuses on helping large dogs maintain joint health with glucosamine.
pros: Has a kibble size that encourages the dog to chew it thoroughly, which removes plaque from teeth
Most big dogs can digest the food easily
Multiple proteins that allow for lean muscle development

website_summaries.verdict: One of the least expensive options for keeping your giant dog fed with a quality recipe that includes healthy ingredients. Brand is popular and trusted.
pros: Also includes beets, eggs, and tomatoes
Comes at a reasonable price point
Crunchy kibble helps clean tartar from teeth
Includes prebiotics for a healthy digestive system and glucosamine for bones and joints
cons: Not for grain- or poultry-free diets
Some reports of dogs experiencing digestive upset after eating it

customer_reviews.title: First purchase was great, but........
customer_reviews.text: I night this bag for a great price. Dog food was fresh which I am happy about because some reviews I read said the food smelled bad. The only bad thing about it is when I tried to repurchase it said it was no longer available but I could get it through other sellers. I checked and every other seller is selling the same bag which was 30lbs.was now just about twice as much as I paid when I bought it the first time. Needless to say, back to Target or Walmart for the dog food. This is why only 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My dog is doing just fine
customer_reviews.text: I feed this to my pure bred French Mastiff and he’s built like an ox! He’s healthy active and a perfect weight at 140lbs. He’s 3 years old and I’ve been feeding him Iams since 2 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Keeper

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Not happy
customer_reviews.text: We periodically switch dog food brands to see what works and doesn't with our dogs. Recently we switched from Canidae All Life Stages (which has been their favorite), our Lab and Maltese jump for joy when they see that we purchased that. But... Iams.... They just aren't as happy with, and I think we are fed up with Iams because each of the times we've purchased it, we see our dogs vomiting once a week or more when eating this. It comes at a nice price, but something in this food just doesn't want to stay in our dogs stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Sangha

customer_reviews.title: IMES has no pea powder or peas --that ingredient has allergic reactions in some breeds
customer_reviews.text: Years ago, Husband toured the facility and was content on the manner in which it was run. For that reason, we continued using IMES Friend of mine said it was BAD for dogs, so I switched to an EXPENSIVE DOG food Unbeknownst to me it contained pea powder highly allergic to some breeds. Using this food my 3 dogs developed continual itching 24/7 I went back to IMES I sincerely hope their factory is still CLEAN
customer_reviews.author: Piscesfish

customer_reviews.title: Making My Dog Sick
customer_reviews.text: Had major problems with Iams dog food making my dog throw up and diarrhea. Seems to be limited to the batch of Iams dog food I got on Amazon. I've taken my dog off Iams and the diarrhea and throwing up has stopped. Just thought it was worth letting others know if your dogs having these issues it's probly the food.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality less gas
customer_reviews.text: So my dogs are my babies, I am very picky about there food. Sadly I can’t afford science diet or there generic brand. Due to shipping cost on those two are much higher than the cost itself of the food. Or they won’t ship to me due to where we live. This dog food is the next best thing reduces my dogs gas doesn’t cause loose stools. They don’t gain massive weight on it and keep a good balanced weight. I do give them a multivitamin just to make sure there getting everything they need.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for this!
customer_reviews.text: Right at the beginning of the whole Covid-19 quarantine mess I realized we were running low on dog food. With all the panic buying people we're doing it was nearly impossible to find anywhere in stores. This not only delivered directly to my house but it was also a decent price. Also the food itself is great for our dog. The large pieces force him to actually CHEW his food. And his Labernard coat is nice and shiny. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: c.rea.97.85

customer_reviews.title: Good balance of healthy food & reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: High quality, not full of grain or lots of fillers. My 90-lb, 6-1/2 year-old shelter-rescue German Shepherd likes it. I mix it with some other health-oriented low-grain wet & dry foods. Since she has a chronic eye disorder & is a breed prone to hip problems, I look for food with an emphasis on things that will help her stay healthy at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Machanic

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned my dogs would have digestive problems switching their food because they are older dogs. Because I couldn't find their regular dog food available in any stores and I have been isolating myself, I decided to buy the IAMS. Dogs are wondering what took me so long to switch dog food......they love it!!! Bonus points - the dog food arrived a day earlier than scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter Dog

customer_reviews.title: Re: convenience, emergency
customer_reviews.text: We have used this dog food for years. Both our labs attack their bowl after given the signal to eat. They seem to love it. (Though my dogs also like to chew cardboard, so who knows!) Having this automatically ordered from Amazon is a great convenience. No more last minute runs to grocery for bag of dog food! Also, I have learned from other pet advocates to always keep extra bag on hand for emergencies such as flooding, or local disasters. Sometimes pets are thought of last, and it's one less thing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: I bought Iams puppy food for a year for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought Iams puppy food for a year for my puppy and so when he turned 1yrs old I switched to Iams ProActive Health Dry Dog Food and my boy broke out in an rash all over his chest, under his arms and in between his toes. His eyes where red and I just don't know what they put in this that is different then there puppy food. Sorry I can't reccomend this product. I Donated a 30 pound bag to the local dog pound.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Goodman

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Iams for over 25 years....love it and the fur babies do as well. They have beautiful coats and are very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your dogs fuller!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this dog food. I have 2 Australian shepherds and finding a food that fills them up and keeps them full is a struggle. We went through probably 50lb dog food every 3 weeks give or take. Now a 30lb bag last over a month. It seems to be keeping them alot fuller. They really like the dog food and dont snub their noses at it like others we tried. For the price compared to other brands it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Lila scarfed then barfed
customer_reviews.text: I have a Labrador, well-known for their ability to eat and digest everything. You never realize how many things are edible in the world till you take your labrador for a walk. Anyway she ate this new food for breakfast and about eight hours later barfed it back up semi intact. So, I have to call it a failure. Going back to 'Science Diet'
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Substitute for science diet
customer_reviews.text: My boxer loved hills science diet. For some reason hills changed the packaging and charged 20 bucks more. So after lots of research and with some reluctance we’re trying IAMS. Happy to say we save money and Kona had no problem transitioning. Did not upset her stomach and she loves it. No loose stool, no problems. I recommend it as an alternative to the discontinued hills science diet or rather the old packaging hills.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Buy at the store.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has been eating this for over 2 and half years. She usually would devour it in a few minutes. With this bag, she would eat a little and then leave it. She might finish it after a few hours, sometimes not. We were concerned about her health but she had just had her checkup. As soon as we replaced the food with a new bag that we bought at Target, she went right back to eating it quickly. Wondering how long this bag was sitting in the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good value when ordering a large bag. My greyhound prefers it to the comparable Science Diet product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Supancich

customer_reviews.title: I think this batch must be bad? My dog throws up regularly after eating this ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but in this case it's important to spread the word. This was my second time ordering this brand from Amazon. I think this batch must be bad? My dog throws up regularly after eating this bag of dog food. The reason I feel confident it's the food...we travel and I decided to buy dog food when we arrived at our destination instead of packing this batch. He was never sick, then when we got back home I gave him the suspected bad batch...sick again. Throwing it up 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: It's a dog-eat Iams world
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy because I didn't have to lug a 30 lb bag of dog food from store shelf, to cart, to car, to house. The dogs are happy as they seem to like the Iams a lot better than the variety of Purina brands I've tried. But above all, having heavy bulk dog food delivered to my front door: Priceless
customer_reviews.author: 3Dog Knight

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like dog food but dog seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: Well I pride myself on honest reviews so I ate one piece. I can’t say it deserves a 5 Star on flavor but my dog seems to disagree. I personally think its too expensive but dog eats it (I don’t want anymore), poopies all seem good and I didn’t have to go into Walmart to buy it. That’s worth a 5 Star to me by itself!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I gave this dog food five stars for flavor because to this date neither one of my Dobermans has come up to me and complained about their tables. My dogs do not have any health issues, nor skin issues and no digestion issues. They have been eating this food their entire life, female 5 yrs and the male 15 months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves it, Great Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: Although I personally cannot vouch for flavor, my dog seems to love it. We recently switch to the adult food from the Large Breed Puppy and it was an easy transition and my dog loves her food. IAMS is a quality brand and I rest well knowing that they have used the best ingredients for my pups.
customer_reviews.author: CupcakeMagana

customer_reviews.title: Dog enjoys it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how it tastes but we have been buying Iams since he was a puppy. The subscribe and save is hit or miss though, one month it was $30, the next time I needed it, it was $70 for the same amount. Inconsistent. So, I would buy again, just not with subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Bad dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs won't eat this. I tried for a couple of days to get them to eat but they wouldn't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: ryork3521

customer_reviews.title: I bought this once before and forgot...
customer_reviews.text: that my dog barely eats it, she chewed and ate grass like crazy and she had foul smelling farts. She did not like it. Period. I won't put her and I through it again. I do not recommend this dog food as I had forgotten a year and a half ago that we went through this same scenario.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Significant price savings!
customer_reviews.text: Although I can't personally vouch for the flavor and ingredient quality, my dogs love it, and buying though Amazon reduces the price significantly when compared to the grocery store. The best part: It gets delivered to my front door - no more struggling to load into my shopping cart, out of the cart and into my car, and from the car and into the house!
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Good food but Iams outta here with amazons prices
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and we had a subscription for it. However, Amazon raised their price by almost 60%, 32$ I believe for a 30lb bag to nearly 60 so I now get it from chewy for less, 31$ for 30lb bag than Amazon's original price.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: A great quality dog food at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I think Iams is a very good dog food; made by Eukanuba I beleive. I'm a veterinarian and It's what I always buy for my dogs. Good price and I can find it at Walmart and Amazon; don't have to go to one of those over priced pet stores. By the way, dogs like the small bites better than the large bites. So if your dog is small and chubby, don't buy the small bites and they won't eat so much.
customer_reviews.author: S. GarrettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great item for recurring delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I love getting this big heavy bag of food delivered every month or so for my Goldendoodle! Saves so much room in the grocery cart and wear and tear on my back! We store it in a large dog food bin so we don’t have to worry about it going stale.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two R Girls

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: Since this is dog food I have NOT tried it personally but my pets appear to enjoy it...but they also eat their own feces
customer_reviews.author: badgirl

customer_reviews.title: My three Golden Retrivers love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sue on flavor but I know all three of my Golden retrievers have had nothing but Aims and they are all heathy In shape and energetic so that says a lot. Getting it delivered to my door at a great price is wonderful and easy I don’t have to pick up carry around store load in car carry up to house can’t beat that and at a better price too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Do not feed to your dog.
customer_reviews.text: Fed this to our dog who became violently ill for the next few days after consuming, found similar reviews for the same product online.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Macmillan

customer_reviews.title: Life savor
customer_reviews.text: Have been feeding to my pup and he loves it. I bought this during the pandemic because my local grocery store was out, I am very greatful you guys had it. I felt bad for the delivery driver though, its stinking heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley saxon

customer_reviews.title: Made my all 3 of my dogs SICK!
customer_reviews.text: After deciding to switch dog foods and iambs was recommended I purchased a bag, Thought my dogs ate it well enough so I set up a monthly delivery. All three of my farm dogs which are healthy dogs with a variety of age and breed started becoming listless, yellow eye discharge, hair dull and falling out. They don’t want to eat the food now. Won’t use Iams again, see other reviews on health problems after using this food.
customer_reviews.author: S. AMRINE

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: I was buying the vegan food but switch to this and my dogs love it. Other foods would give them diarrhea or vomit but this food seem to be working really well. Price still pricey but I rather keep buying this than the vegan dog food I was buying before.
customer_reviews.author: Vilma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome excellent dog food!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 baby dawns 7,5 & two 3 year olds... Lab, Catahoula and 2 Lab mixes... All rescued 😊💗💗💗💙 Love Iams 💙 They are all over 50 pounds. I never feed them anything but Iams or Science diet! They are healthy and not overweight.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: My Rottweiler loves it
customer_reviews.text: Not the best dog food on market but my rottie has a very sensitive stomach, we tried blue buffalo, nutro, all the top brands and no luck, his stomach got tore up each time and yes I know how to switch dog foods, little at a time, he came to me on iams so we had to go back to iams
customer_reviews.author: Craig DiLullo

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have to say...I switched from Blue buffalo to this brand, because it is what I feed my cat and he loves it. Turns out, my dog LOVES IT! So glad I gave it a try for her. The price and quality are great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie F.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food for my St Bernard
customer_reviews.text: Please take me off of the subscription. Every time I hit one time order it goes to subscription. I buy as needed. And I have noticed your prices have really jumped. I do like this product and it is very healthy for my St. Bernard. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: terrylee payne

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: My golden doesnt seem to like this anymore. I'm going to research and find something else. Iams was a great company until they were bought out. No research since. Just bought the name.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not for Picky Eaters
customer_reviews.text: I used this for years with my old Lab/Shepherd mix. But my new Husky/Shepherd Mix is turning up his nose to it. It's a great value and vet recommended, but my picky dog doesn't like it. Back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Louise

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged dogfood fell out all over my sidewalk
customer_reviews.text: Both box and dog food arrive damaged with dog food. I am so disappointed In this packaging because- I need dogfood! There was also a new iluv alarm clock in the box that I ordered as a gift and the alarm clock box is torn and smashed unsure if it even works. How can I give this as a gift now!? Iams dog food is a great food for my mastiffs so disappointed this delivery is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Product fine.  Delivery poor.
customer_reviews.text: I would really like to have this dogfood delivered to my 91 year old father each month; however, twice it has been left by or near the mailbox on the roadside. The second time I requested that it be delivered to his house and not left by the mailbox for him to try and pickup. (Not to mention that it is susceptible to the weather and someone stealing it. Not likely but very possible.)
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dog food in the entire world. Or at least in my opinion it is.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog food in the entire world. Or at least in my opinion it is. Got grape flavor, good consistency, good texture, and it makes her poops look really really good too.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Meat is the #1 ingredient
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs are a very healthy weight and don’t have any allergies. I’ve been feeding my dogs Iams for many years and a I will continue to do so. Meat is the first ingredient which is very important. *HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Keeper

customer_reviews.title: 5-3 cups per day as recommended, split over 2 meals
customer_reviews.text: My 70 lb hound dog has eaten this food for years, and we've never had an issue. The kibbles are fairly large, so the food is definitely meant for larger breeds as the product details suggest. We give 2.5-3 cups per day as recommended, split over 2 meals, and that is enough to provide plenty of energy for an active day. I also like how chicken is the first ingredient. This food is fairly priced and it is so much easier to have delivered to my front door than lug home from the market.
customer_reviews.author: M Dot

customer_reviews.title: My dog eats it
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding this to my 11 year old Boxer for most of his life and he's still alive and kicking! I can't rate the flavor because I have never tasted it, but the dog seems to love it!
customer_reviews.author: BethanyG

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Food and the Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than my grocery stores and it's delivered to my back porch! I've raised quite a few dogs on this food. Currently a pair of Aussies. All my dogs lived into their mid teens and I've had no trouble maintaining a good weight on them.
customer_reviews.author: Cattlelady

customer_reviews.title: Great Dane/Husky loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally finished transitioning my dog to this food. He was eating a grain free kibble before so I was nervous he would have trouble digesting this, but since I did it very slowly, I think he took to it well! No problems and he's excited about eating again! I think he was getting bored with his old food.
customer_reviews.author: CorrieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dog Chow
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a mistreated shelter dog and he doesn't trust people or food, but he loved this and as long as I can give him a happy home where he will learn to trust humans again, I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Harmon-Schifferling

customer_reviews.title: Good for the dog, dog food
customer_reviews.text: I had an 80-pound yellow lab who I fed only IAMs to his whole life and he lived to be 14 years old. So healthy, I never spent a dime on him except for shots. When he died, it was a peaceful passing with his family in his own yard.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Kiernan

customer_reviews.title: Something is different
customer_reviews.text: My dogs won't eat this food If I buy in the local store it's fine. Something must be different that they can smell or taste????
customer_reviews.author: Linda J

customer_reviews.title: Great Food, Perfect Size Kibble
customer_reviews.text: My Ella loves this food! I had to buy a different brand about a month ago and she would leave it in her bowl for hours. When this came she got so excited even before I opened the bag. I could barely get it to her bowl before she dove in. When I ask if she’s ready to eat she starts dancing. She never does with other brands. The size of the kibble is great for Ella, a 55 lb pound pup.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Mastiff approved
customer_reviews.text: Keeps our Cane Corso full and healthy. And surprisingly even after the years of the same taste my pup gets excited every time we fill the bowl!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Affordable High quality food
customer_reviews.text: We have done extensive dog food research to find the product that will keep our canine family members healthy & fit. This seems to be the highest quality for the best cost & earns our veterinarian’s approval.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this food and use it exclusively with my 90 pound dog. His coat is shiny and very healthy. Also, with this food his “business” is well formed, low odor, and easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Less dog food then before?
customer_reviews.text: Our dog seems to like it, and is supposed to be healthy. I did notice the last bag I bought no longer contained as much dog food as it did in the past. Maybe it was reformulated? The container we us, and have used for two years, to store the food never held the full bag, now it does. But I guess like everything else these days, we get less for the same money they hope we won’t notice. Anyone else remember when sugar was a 5 pound bag?
customer_reviews.author: Justsilvie

customer_reviews.title: Where's my chunks?
customer_reviews.text: It's perfectly iams, but Wembley wishes they made a choice of bigger chunks for his big mouth! That's the reason for only 4 stars. These BIG dogs sometimes lose these smaller pieces in their mouth and, if they are Wembley's they end up spring it out on the floor so they can see it again. My Wembley gets frustrated and stops eating f for awhile, not a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: path66002

customer_reviews.title: Quality economical food.
customer_reviews.text: This food is really good -- good quality and economical price. My only complaint is that Amazon delivers it in a HUGE box. It's a lot of cardboard that ends up (for us) in the recycling, but I bet that's not where it ends up for lots of people. That's a lot of cardboard headed for the landfill, IMHO. I've stopped ordering it based on that.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of one

customer_reviews.title: Our god loves it and it’s reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog (1.5 year Labernese) loves this food. Previously she was on a Nulo grain-free kibble but with the recent concerns about grain free food we switched to this product. This is the third bag and so far so good. Plus it’s a little less expensive to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: I'm assuming the flavor is 5 star because all 3 of my dogs eat it well. Well priced. Healthier alternative for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: debbiesr65

customer_reviews.title: not properly packaged at all
customer_reviews.text: Been buying on a recurring order of once a month. The latest shipment arrived today completely unboxed just the dog food bag. Bag is rough shape when opening the bag there is about half the dog food had been reduced to crumbles. Not acceptable will not buy anymore.
customer_reviews.author: lnsfarms

customer_reviews.title: May not be great for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: Great price for dog food, but unfortunately my dog did not care for this and I had to switch back to the original food he was on.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have dog food available for delivery during pandemic. Transitioned from my dogs normal food and his vowel movements are healthy and he enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: My dog is an IAMS dog.
customer_reviews.text: I switched from IAMS puppy to this when my Great Dane turned 18 months old. He had no issues with the change and chows it down at every meal.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Willis

customer_reviews.title: dogs love it and keeps them healthy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs coats have been so much healthier since I began feeding them this food. They really like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Quality product from a quality focused company!
customer_reviews.text: A great price for a healthy formula food for our boxers. Anything produced by the Mars company is okay with me. Take a look at the company's five guiding principles and how they put them into action all over the world. The entire company top to bottom has a strong commitment to quality!
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Balanced Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Iams Proactive Health Large Breed Dry Dog Food is reasonably priced and provides good nutrition for my dogs, and they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Random order of cookies arrived via FedEx
customer_reviews.text: Has anyone ever received a random order of grasshopper cookies when ordering this Dog Food? It’s a random occurrence that’s happened twice to me and I’m unsure if these are even related.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food for our Australian Shepherd. This is a good price and very convenient to have it delivered to our door by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Lab and Pit approved
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs really like this and its always easy to find - our lab is sensitive to some foods and this is one of the few he can handle that doesnt give him "hot spots" or any bowel problems - would still be getting nature domain from costco if we had one locally - natures domain was too expensive via amazon so we went back to this Iams.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Love this food!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a great price on this food! We have tried everything from the really expensive brand dog food to the cheapest...this is the only food that my dog will eat every time we put it out. The others she would skip meals and simply not eat. We have been able to make her an inside dog not that her bathroom habits are controlled.
customer_reviews.author: amber collier

customer_reviews.title: My dogs don't like it
customer_reviews.text: My Samoyeds will only eat this when they are really hungry. I bought them lamb flavor and they like it much better.
customer_reviews.author: Sling

customer_reviews.title: Dog Doesn't Like, and I Have Concerns About Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Main issue revolves around quality of ingredients. Expert reviewers put it on the, "Worst Dry Dog Food" list because of at one bad ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: John Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Good food.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good food, but not the best. It's what my husband's guide dog started out on, but it made him gassy and he kept losing weight. We now have him on a new diet and he's doing marvelously.
customer_reviews.author: E&E0715Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: BUGS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I found little bugs in the food when I pored the first bowl and I quickly checked the bad and there was more so I had to toss the whole bag of food away. So keep an eye out on the food the first time you scoop out to serve your dog.
customer_reviews.author: LupuswontwinK

customer_reviews.title: My dog eats it, not me
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like it. And Iams has a good reputation. That's about all I can go off of. Cause it ain't me eatin' it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Danes love it!
customer_reviews.text: This food is amazing for the price. We feed it to our two Great Danes, and they have never had any issues with it. Im usually very picky about what I will feed them, but the ingredients in this are what I'd expect of a top quality food that can only be bought at some fancy shmancy pet food store, and not something I imagined IAMS would use, and I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: I switched back to the food I was using previously (Purina Pro Plan) and they've been feeling much better.
customer_reviews.text: I think I might have switched my dogs over to this food too quickly, because it made them both sick with GI issues. I switched back to the food I was using previously (Purina Pro Plan) and they've been feeling much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Scepanski

customer_reviews.title: A fine product
customer_reviews.text: The hounds been on this dog food his entire life. My trusted vet suggested and I’ve never used anything else. Also nice it comes to my front door next day at the click of a button. Also cheaper than at almost any store
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great product packaging
customer_reviews.text: I never had a problem with shipping. My bag was never damaged and the fresh dates were always good.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Berkeley was itching terribly with a couple of other dog foods. found this one and it has taken care of itching and it is helped with his shedding as well.
customer_reviews.author: Howard L Trent

customer_reviews.title: Better Deal at BJ’s
customer_reviews.text: I can get a much bigger back at BJ’s for the price I paid for this. Won’t buy this again here.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Dogs don't like this new bag
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they changed the ingredients or what, but both my dogs have been rejecting it after eating it for 11 months.
customer_reviews.author: Just another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and I don't worry about them eating junk dog food full of fillers with it.
customer_reviews.author: MShuey

customer_reviews.title: Iams healthy choice dog food large chunks
customer_reviews.text: Bought on Shop & Save monthly. 2 mature adult dogs & they love eating this this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous5

customer_reviews.title: Labrador approved!
customer_reviews.text: The labs like it and it is much cheaper than what they were eating. They seem to eat it well and their health is great. Their coats look very healthy. This food also doesn't seem to cause a huge mess on the pen floor like some other foods do, if you know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Smithlord

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of food for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my dogs on cheaper foods that seem to be just fillers. They’d eat more and not be as active. I can tell the difference in their diet and attitude having them on this food. I’ve even tried higher end brands but they didn’t like it. Overall good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not great for extrem active dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog wouldn't hold weight on this food. He is extremely active. Went to Eukanuba sport.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: My English Goldendoodle has eaten Iams dog food his entire life. He is healthy and happy. He just went to the vet yesterday and had another great visit. I love having this heavy bag delivered right to my door. He seems to enjoy the flavor and is always ready to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: So easy! Great dog food. Been ordering this dog food for the last year on amazon for our 2 year old golden. My wife no longer has to handle the big bag at the store by herself!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Karl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Caused my dog to loose hair and break out in hit spots, from constant scratching. Once I stopped the food I saw the hair gradually return and no scratching. Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.author: M. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Made my animals ill
customer_reviews.text: This made all 4 of my dogs super sick. I have never had a problem with this but the last bag made the dogs have bloody diarrhea and throwing up everywhere. 3 are getting better and one is still not good. The vet told me to put them on a bland diet and some yogurt for a few days. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food! We chose it as it was healthier than a previous brand we were using (and our vet recommended it!), but still great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Esandbothe

customer_reviews.title: Great food with appropriate vitamins and nutrients
customer_reviews.text: I was a professional police K9 handler for 14 years. This is all I ever feed my dogs. It kept them healthy, strong and fit. (maybe I should have eaten it too :)
customer_reviews.author: Colonel170

customer_reviews.title: God for ages
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies have done well on Ian’s for 20 years! About 8 babies...
customer_reviews.author: MARCIA FRASER

customer_reviews.title: Great Dane loves iams
customer_reviews.text: Our Great Dane loves his iams! Getting it automatically delivered is amazing! Saves me from having to lug the two 30lbs bags home from the store each month
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like and I feel I am giving them a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Dogs like and I feel I am giving them a good product that's good for them at a good price plus the bonus of being delivered right to my door so I don't have to haul it in/out of cart and the car and then in/out of the car when I get home. Win/win situation!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinetsb

customer_reviews.title: Makes your dog sick
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog have the runs and he didn’t want to eat it after 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: ) It's nice just having this left at the doorstep for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Price was right and the dog had no issues with it! He's ten years old and some foods don't agree with his tummy. (We'll just leave it at that!) It's nice just having this left at the doorstep for a change instead of having to drag it back from BJs etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

product_meta.title: Iams Large Breed Adult Dry Dog Food, Chicken
product_meta.description: Size:30 lb.IAMS ProActive Health Adult Dog Food for Large Dogs is veterinarian recommended and made with real ingredients. Our recipe starts with farm raised chicken and includes wholesome grains and veggies. It’s formulated with glucosamine and chondroitin sulfate for healthy joints. Plus, our quality, easily digestible ingredients provide your dog with a strong immune system; healthy skin, coat, and metabolism; and strong bones. Look for the IAMS difference. Formulated with L-carnitine to help burn fat and maintain healthy metabolism.
feature_bullets: Contains one (1) 30 pound Bag of IAMS Proactive Health Adult Large Breed Dry Dog Food Chicken
Veterinarians recommend IAMS; we’ve got your dog’s diet down to a science
Specially formulated for your Large breed dog to maintain Healthy bones and Joints
Includes glucosamine and chondroitin sulfate used to treat osteoarthritis
Promotes strong muscles with premium quality lean protein
Maintains healthy digestive health and immunity with a blend of fiber and prebiotics
